message: Let's split the money nearly in half, Bob. This seems fair considering the inflation will affect you more.
Considering the inflation, I think I should get the bigger share this time.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a bit more than last round, acknowledging the inflation impact on your share. It's a good deal for both of us.
Inflation is taking its toll, I need a bigger share to make up for the loss.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to end this now.  The inflation is only going to hurt you more if we wait. Take the deal!
